name: Joyita
description:
The idea of this game inspired from a real story. MV Joyita was a merchant vessel from which 25 passengers and crew mysteriously disappeared in the South Pacific. It was found adrift with no one aboard. Investigators were puzzled as to why the crew had not remained on board and waited for help.

Now, you are one of the crew of Joyita. You are awaked and surprised to find nobody is on this vessel. All the passengers turn out to be captured and cruelly killed by some horrible THING . All you have to do is try to escape from Joyita and not caught by ‘it’.

 

The more you move, the more dangerous you will be. So try to stay calm and slow down.

 

Gameplay:

Gamepad：

➡ to move left or right

Keyboard：

‘A’ and ‘D’ to move left or right

‘W’+ 'D' or ‘W’+ 'A'   to climb

 ‘S’+ 'D' or ‘S’+ 'A' to go downstairs
